thread.title: Winter Park Gal
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Winter Park Gal

author: Winter Park Gal
title: Winter Park Gal
text: My husband is a hunter and unable to do his passion because we are in Florida 6 -7 months a year! For Christmas I wanted to surprise him with Venison snack sticks and went searching - found Burgers' Smokehouse! They have the BEST meats, snacks! We will become loyal customers! Thank you Burgers' Smokehouse!!!
